message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand that $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can we try $105? That's as high as I'm willing to go.
I'm still a bit away from your target, but I'm willing to try again. How about we go to $115? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. Can you meet me at $108? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $112. It's the best I can do. Take it or leave it.
